name: Black Flags
description:
Black Flags

In 1714 the maritime trade routes are continuously attacked by pirate ships. All nations affected resolved to dictate a law declaring every pirate an enemy of humanity.

In response, the pirates declared war on the world.

Your ship was intercepted and sunk by imperial galleons your crew is dead or missing and only you could escape and reach safe harbor. here begins your adventure choose from several renowned pirates and start the adventure, or name your character and create your own story, board merchant ships take their loot, fight against imperial ships for control of the sea. that and many more things are what you can do in this game, Hoist the sails Captain!
